title: Old launcher won't update
body: I downloaded the game and got the old launcher. I then tried to update it, but nothing happened. When I try to launch the game the button goes grey then turns red again after a few seconds.

replies.body:
If your launch button grays out it means that your network lost it's connection to our servers. Without a stable connection, it won't let you launch the client since the patcher can't talk with our servers to authenticate your login info. Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to get back on the Rift.

Hit me back up if you're still having problems!

I have the same problem and the connection isn't the issue here considering I've been using it for everything else and it works fine. I've made it work through my firewall fixed the DNS compatibility and everything in between. I'm sorry but this isn't an issue on our end, it's a bug due to the patch and it needs to be resolved.
